patthana12.16:1.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
patthana12.16:1.1_1: ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:2.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.16:3.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana12.16:4.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
patthana12.16:4.1_1: ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:5.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana12.16:6.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.16:7.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
patthana12.16:7.1_1: ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:8.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.16:9.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana12.16:10.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana12.16:11.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
